title: Topic 001 Question 016
body: You are managing the production deployment to a set of Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) clusters. You want to make sure only images which are successfully built by your trusted CI/CD pipeline are deployed to production. What should you do?
options: Enable Cloud Security Scanner on the clusters.
Enable Vulnerability Analysis on the Container Registry.
Set up the Kubernetes Engine clusters as private clusters.
Set up the Kubernetes Engine clusters with Binary Authorization.
